name: Mistmarsh Swamplands
description: Murky waters stretch between gnarled cypress trees draped in moss. The air is thick with humidity and the constant buzz of insects. Strange lights flicker in the distance, and the ground squelches underfoot.

common.name: swamp_moss
common.description: Spongy moss that can be used for bedding or water filtration.

common.name: bog_iron
common.description: Iron deposits formed in the acidic swamp waters.

uncommon.name: witch_herbs
uncommon.description: Rare plants used in magical potions and dark rituals.

rare.name: black_pearl
rare.description: A rare pearl formed in the toxic waters, prized by wizards.

random_events.name: Dancing Lights
random_events.description: Strange lights dance in the distance, leading deeper into the swamp. Local legends speak of both treasure and doom.

follow_lights.description: You follow the mesmerizing lights deeper into the marsh.

investigate_cautiously.description: Your careful approach reveals the lights' true nature.
